data.name: Operation Osama Bin Laden
data.detailed_description:
Operation Osama Bin Laden is a tactical action/strategy game set against the backdrop of Global War on Terrorism. Take control of an elite group of commandos who must venture deep into enemy territory and utilize their combined expertise to complete a series of mission-based objectives. Go covert into new environment based on Northern Pakistan: Abbottabad. Send them behind enemy territories on a hazardous mission, and bring them back alive. Study the enemy's movements, develop a careful plan, synchronize your men, and launch them on a swift and fierce attack using all your power and skill.

  • Control four commandos: including Captain, Sniper, demolitions expert and a Spy.
  • All new 3D environment : rotate the environment 360 degrees and zoom in/out on the environment.

data.short_description: Upon discovering the location of the Al-Qaeda leader in exile, the US army sends their best commandos to northern Pakistan. Take control of these commandos, send them behind enemy territories on a hazardous mission, and bring them back alive.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Core i3-2100, FX-4100 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti or AMD R7 260 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
